about_the_game:
Happy Holidays!

Trimmer Tycoon's Holiday Skin Bundle includes five brand new customer skins. The skins are based on holiday characters. Spice up the game with even more variety and colorfulness! The new characters will be added into all customer tiers.

This pack includes the following skins:
- Santa Claus for Christmas
- Pumpkinhead for Halloween
- Uncle Sam for July 4th
- Leprechaun for St. Patrick's Day
- Easter Bunny for Easter

This DLC is meant as a way to support us with little donations while getting awesome content in return. Please see the other DLCs (Improx Skin Bundle, Sports Skin Bundle and Fantasy Skin Bundle) for different money amounts and even more awesome skins.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
